The CDC reported that 182: 622 Americans have died from COVID-19 as of August 31, contradicting the claim of only 9,210 deaths.
Multiple posts on social media: including those shared by President Trump, falsely claimed that the CDC adjusted the COVID-19 death numbers to 9,210.
The claim originated on Facebook before: indicating a potential spread of misinformation.
The claim was based on an older version: NCHS) that analyzed 153,504 deaths involving COVID-19, which does not reflect the current and updated data.
